lines.text: Would you mind closing your eyes so I could use the phone?
David, this is not going to work if you're ashamed to introduce me to your parents.
I am not ashamed of you. If anything, I'm ashamed of my paren...
Shhhhh! Everybody's ashamed of their parents.
If you two lovebirds will accept a word of advice from a middle-aged curmudgeon, beware wasting time. If you have a choice between wasting time and wasting money, waste the money.
